overview: Already the fourth sequel of the popular song DVD for children from Maria Podhradska and Richard Canaky Spievankovo ​​4 will get you through the Spievankovo country, where lives Spievanka and Zahrajko, lives a fairy Nezábudka and her friend rabbit Smejko.  Smejko bunny who loves to travel, wants to go on a trip to England. Fairy Nezábudka therefore invites to Spievankovo ​​her small English friends who teach bunny Smejko English. They experience many adventures and fun and sing cheerful English songs:  1. Dobré ráno, milé kvietky  2. Hello  3. Good morning  4. My name is Emily  5. Farm animals  6. One, two, three  7. Blue is the sky  8. I am the music man  9. I get up in the morning  10. Head, shoulders, knees and toes  11. I am big  12. Bread and butter  13. I will go by bus  14. Dobrú noc vám prajem, kvietky
title: Spievankovo 4
